DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to investigate the effects of red wine on ABCA1 levels
DOC.brief_title: The Effect of Alcohol on ABCA1 Expression and Lipid Metabolism
DOC.criteria: Healthy participants Aged 1865 years Free of overt coronary disease BMI < 35 Fasting plasma glucose <6.1 mmol Unmedicated No major illness Unable to give informed consent Smokers Participants with alcoholism
